news.title: ‘Our child begged for her life that day – she went off to her debs and all we got back was her dress’
news.summary: For most teens on the cusp of adulthood, the debs is the single biggest event in their young adult lives. In the McCann household in Clones, Co Monaghan, it was no different.

news.title: ‘Nobody knew this was all going on in London’ – news of Patrick Kielty and Cat Deeley’s split came as ‘huge surprise’ to RTÉ colleagues
news.summary: The revelation that Patrick Kielty had quietly separated from his TV star wife Cat Deeley came as a “huge surprise” to his RTÉ colleagues.

news.title: James Ryan and Blair Kinghorn to start final Lions Test in Australia as Farrell makes two changes to team
news.summary: James Ryan will start for the Lions against Australia in the final match of the 2025 tour, with Andy Farrell making two changes to his starting XV as Blair Kinghorn comes in for James Lowe.

news.title: ‘It is Éabha who keeps us going’ – family who lost daughter (3) to rare genetic condition on mission to save her little sister
news.summary: Éabha Duggan is determined to take her first steps. With her arms outstretched to her father, Tommy, she pauses for a moment then turns back and wraps herself into her mother Martina’s arms.

news.title: Number of cases of people being treated for alcohol abuse at highest in 10 years, as cocaine use also soars
news.summary: The number of cases of people undergoing treatment for alcohol abuse is the highest in more than a decade, new figures show.

news.title: The Indo Daily: ‘It’s like a sick perversion of Squid Game’: Horror in Gaza as tide begins to turn against Netanyahu
news.summary: The front pages of newspapers, the endless scroll of social media posts, the nightly television bulletins…

news.title: Frank Roche: Who might jump from the pack to reel in Kerry kingpins?
news.summary: Different year, same old story. An All-Ireland champion emerges, invincible when it matters most, and is duly installed as everyone’s red-hot tip to repeat the trick 12 months hence.

news.title: Barry Cowen: Imperfect tariff deal is a huge relief, but EU and Ireland have more to do
news.summary: The EU-US trade deal announced in Scotland last Sunday is more of a framework agreement than a full treaty, but it is one of the largest trade arrangements ever struck.

news.title: Restaurant review: ‘The tasty small plates at this exciting new opening are well thought-out’
news.summary: Beau is located in the heart of London's exclusive West End. The restaurant is open from 4pm on the Tuesday after a bank holiday weekend.

news.title: ‘I quit my job to travel around Asia for two months – it taught me a lot about burnout’
news.summary: I read a statistic a couple of months ago that said more Irish people have travelled to south east Asia than to Leitrim. I guess I’m in the minority then because I’ve been to both.
